alert.note: Alert for Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Talbot County through 300 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Olive Branch, or near Talbotton, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Talbotton, Junction City, Geneva, Box Springs, Baldwinville, Baughville, Olive Branch and Po Biddy Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
